experience.title: Recent impact
experience.lede: Quick meta view; open any role to see responsibilities and outcomes.
experience.fraunhofer2021.title: Backend Developer & Data Scientist — Fraunhofer EMI
experience.fraunhofer2021.desc: Building GenAI assistants, knowledge graphs, and data pipelines for material life-cycle analysis and production planning.
experience.fraunhofer2021.list:
• Built RDF/OWL ontologies and knowledge graphs for additive manufacturing LCA
  • Ran SPARQL pipelines in GraphDB with Python ETL for downstream analytics
  • Delivered RESTful Flask services in Docker with CI/CD and API integrations
  • Supervised a master student, led agile requirements, and Jira-based delivery
experience.aurore.title: Co-founder & CEO — Aurore Collection
experience.aurore.desc: Managed an e-commerce company end-to-end: management, site build, marketing, and business model.
experience.aurore.list:
• Launched the site, payments, fulfillment, and analytics stack
  • Drove growth via marketing experiments and conversion tracking
  • Led a lean remote team and vendor partners
experience.fraunhofer2021spring.title: Research Assistant (Mechanical) — Fraunhofer EMI
experience.fraunhofer2021spring.desc: Impact and delamination modeling for CFRP configurations with end-to-end simulation workflow.
experience.fraunhofer2021spring.list:
• Built LS-DYNA models, meshing, and parameter tuning
  • Analyzed results and visualized insights in Python
  • Created geometry in Autodesk Inventor and HyperMesh
experience.fraunhofer2020.title: Research Assistant (Mechanical) — Fraunhofer EMI
experience.fraunhofer2020.desc: Failure modeling for hybrid lap joints under tensile loading.
experience.fraunhofer2020.list:
• Designed and meshed components for LS-DYNA studies
  • Converted simulation outputs and automated calculations in Python
  • Visualized fracture mechanics results for reporting
experience.cytena.title: Research Assistant (Internship) — cytena Bioprocess Solutions
experience.cytena.desc: Supported bioprocess hardware assembly and electronics for microbioreactors.
experience.cytena.list:
• Tuned and assembled microbioreactors and docking stations
  • Soldered microcontrollers and components on control boards
experience.inatech.title: Student Research Assistant — Inatech, SSE
experience.inatech.desc: Simulation and experimental support for torsion and fatigue studies.
experience.inatech.list:
• Built LS-DYNA models for torsion tests and analyzed results in Python
  • Ran cyclic stress tests, automating stepper motor control in Python
  • Assembled experimental setups and soldered components
experience.taiwanTech.title: Student Research Assistant - Taiwan Tech
experience.taiwanTech.desc: Spectrum data processing for microalbumin urine tests.
experience.taiwanTech.list:
• Built baseline correction and signal-processing routines in MATLAB
  • Analyzed raw spectroscopic datasets and reported findings
experience.tutor.title: Tutor — Freelance
experience.tutor.desc: Tutored math, physics, and chemistry while supporting students’ applications.
experience.tutor.list:

experience.cgu2015.title: Student Research Assistant - CGU
experience.cgu2015.desc: Supported lab operations and PDMS sensor fabrication research.
